text:
George and Amal Clooney are living la dolce vita! The A-list couple took a night off from parenting their newborn twins Ella and Alexander to enjoy a night out with friends in Italy on Tuesday, July 11. The couple, who welcomed their son and daughter in June, looked tan and happy as they stepped out for dinner at il Gatto Nero, one of their favorite restaurants in Northern Italy. The Oscar winner and lawyer were joined by pal Ben Weiss for the outing. "Everyone was so excited to see him and Amal for dinner," one onlooker told People magazine. "They got many hugs and a lot of love. Amal looked gorgeous and didn't look the slightest bit tired. She kept smiling and looked so happy."

CLICK FOR FULL GALLERY

VER GALERÍA George and Amal recently welcomed their twins Alexander and Ella Photo: © 2017 Mega/The Grosby Group Milano

The human rights attorney looked characteristically chic for the outing wearing a one-shoulder floral frock. Meanwhile the actor sported a grey button down shirt. The first-time parents were photographed arriving to Milan earlier this month with their bundles of joy in tow — marking the first time the duo had been seen in public with Ella and Alexander. Lake Como is a favorite retreat for George, 56, and Amal, 39, and they have often holidayed at their family home there. No doubt the pair are enjoying their first family vacation to Italy with their children.

George and Amal welcomed their twins on June 6 with the couple's son arriving first followed by his sister two minutes later. A rep for the actor confirmed the babies' arrival to HOLA! USA at the time with a statement that read: “This morning Amal and George welcomed Ella and Alexander Clooney into their lives. Ella, Alexander and Amal are all healthy, happy and doing fine. George is sedated and should recover in a few days.”

VER GALERÍA The new parents headed out for a dinner date with friends at il Gatto Nero Photo: © 2017 Mega/The Grosby Group Milano

Amal's mother, Baria Alamuddin, spoke exclusively to HOLA!'s sister brand HELLO! following the twins' birth saying, "The babies are so beautiful and our family is complete. They are going to bring so much joy, and I hope they will be as good as their parents at bringing harmony and human rights to the world. Myself and my husband are thrilled."

She added, "Amal is doing very well, and they are extremely happy and overjoyed. Everything went really smoothly with the birth. I'd like to thank the doctors and staff who looked after them. This is a very happy time in my life, and I’m thrilled to be a grandmother again – I now have eight perfect grandchildren. I am very well practiced! Nothing rivals being a mother except being a grandmother, it's one of the great joys of life."
title: New parents George and Amal Clooney enjoy date night in Italy
